posts.text:
Here are outlined some ideas on how to improve DevOps skills.
The main idea is that you do 5 actions for every skill you need to practice:
Read or watch about a given subject Exercise by doing a project by yourself without following a course Explain what you did for someone with more experience than you Receive Feedback about your skill/project Improve your skill In this post I will provide material so you can do item 1 and 2.
For items 3-5 you need a peer. In case you need someone to help you through this process or just a peer: I do mentorships and you can schedule a mentorship session with me using this link
What you will see is a big list of resources! I hope I can one day divide this post in smaller sections and make this better!
Table of contents Table of contents About IT career What is DevOps Starting in DevOps Coding Git Linux Docker Exercise CI/CD Exercise Cloud AWS Courses Exercise Scripting/APIs Python Exercise - Make a tiny webserver Kubernetes Exercise Other topics About IT career If you are new to IT, it might a good idea to familiarize yourself with the carrer possibilities.

Differences between VMs, Containers and Docker Exercise If you are tired of courses and/or feel you are confident with the Basics try doing:
Print “Hello World” in python on the screen. Run it in your laptop.
Run it in a container using Docker Desktop
Explain to someone, receive feedback and improve
CI/CD If you already know a little bit of the Basics above and know a little about Docker. CI/CD is another important skill to learn.
Watch
What is CICD Github Actions Course Gitlab Course Read
Gitlab Tutorials Exercise Do the Docker Exercise on Basics.md file above
Create a pipeline in Gitlab/Github that will build your docker image using the same tag
Version the docker image to use different tags
Explain your pipeline to someone, get feedback and improve
Cloud Watch
Basic Cloud Course AWS Courses AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials AWS: AWS Cloud Technical Essentials Exercise Pick an exercise from AWS or Azure Explain what you build to someone, get feedback and improve
Automate what you did in step 1 and 2. You can use Terraform. Use this tutorial page if you need help.
Build a pipeline that runs the automation for you. If you need help refer to CI/CD section of this page.
Scripting/APIs Python Python from zero to hero Exercise - Make a tiny webserver Improve your scripting skills.
Build a python web server that listens to 2 endpoints:
/health endpoint should return the version of your application /projects endpoint should return the list of all your projects in GitHub or Gitlab Use CICD.md to built a container + pipeline Kubernetes Watch
Introduction to Kubernetes Kubernetes Tutorials Read https://kubernetes.io/training/ https://kubernetes.io/docs/tutorials/ Exercise Deploy a webserver from previous section using kind Expose your app to a URL so you can access from your browser If you don’t have a webserver you can deploy Google Online Boutique in a local kubernetes
